Interface TargetInventoryEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Event
    All Known Subinterfaces:

    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractChangeEntityEquipmentEvent

    public interface TargetInventoryEvent
extends Event
    Base event for all events with an Inventory as the target.
